title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7930.2 - Definitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7930.2 - Definitions

State Regulations

As used in this Part: (a) Radon testing shall mean the performance
of screening or follow-up testing for radon. (b) Radon assessment shall mean the
performance of investigatory procedures to determine radon entry points and
design appropriate mitigation systems. (c) Radon mitigation shall mean the
installation of materials or equipment to reduce indoor radon. (d) Radon assessment specialist shall mean a
person who meets the criteria established herein. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7930.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
